about.details:
Refractory Shapes Limited was founded in 1996 and manufactures various types of Bricks, Castables, high alumina catalysts and Ceramic Balls.

The company's product list includes pre-cast and pre-fired blocks (PCPF), Burner Blocks, specially shaped refractory bricks, dense and insulating castables, and mortars. The company also receives orders for metallic anchors, which are used as supports for the installation of refractory castings and for which raw materials such as tabular alumina, low alumina bricks and insulating bricks, etc. are required.

The Company's manufacturing facilities are located at Pimpri Industrial Area, Pune, Maharashtra, with a total area of 34,788 sq. ft, and at Wankaner, Morbi district in Gujarat, with a total area of 1,74,246 sq. ft. The Company also has an additional 4 acres of land with an area of 1,74,240 sq. ft. near the existing unit at Wankaner, Gujarat to expand the production unit, to add an additional kiln and manufacture more various types of refractory bricks with pressing machines.

On September 30, 2023, the company had 38 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Refractory Shapes IPO?
faqs.answer:
Refractory Shapes IPO is a SME IPO of 6000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹18.60 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹31 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on May 6, 2024, and closes on May 9, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Refractory Shapes IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Refractory Shapes IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Refractory Shapes IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Refractory Shapes IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Refractory Shapes IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Refractory Shapes IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Refractory Shapes IPO opens on May 6, 2024 and closes on May 9, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Refractory Shapes IPO?
faqs.answer: Refractory Shapes IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,24,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Refractory Shapes IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Refractory Shapes IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Refractory Shapes IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Refractory Shapes IPO will be done on Friday, May 10, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, May 13, 2024. Check the Refractory Shapes IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Refractory Shapes IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Refractory Shapes IPO listing date is on Tuesday, May 14, 2024.
